title: Nvidia Expands Collaborations with Chinese Firms Amid US Constrictive Measures
description: In defiance of persistent efforts by the United States to curb advancements in the Chinese chip industry, Nvidia, a leading US chipmaker, unveiled plans on Monday to intensify collaborations with Chinese enterprises. This move, unveiled during the company’s annual GPU Technology Conference (GTC), marks a significant development in Nvidia’s strategic approach amid escalating tensions between […]
